title: 3rd party apps downloading not working behind proxy
body:
### expected behaviour
3rd party apps should be able to be installed when server behind a proxy

### actual behaviour
could not activate any 3rd party app from the web interface because it does not get downloaded

### steps to reproduce
1. put server behind a proxy
2. access the web interface
3. try do install 3rd party app

### server configuration
operating system: 
wheezy

web server: 
apache

database:
sqlite

php version:
5.4.4

owncloud version:
5.0.7

### client configuration
browser:
chrome

operating system:
linux/osx

### comments :
 after quick inspection it looks like lib/installer.php contained a simple "copy()" in case of a href : 

    copy($data['href'], $path);

this did not work behind my proxy conf specified in the config.php file though the rest does.
changed it to use the utils class by a quick and dirty fix:

    $tmpdata = oc_util::geturlcontent($data['href']);
    file_put_contents ($path, $tmpdata); 

and it worked
